## Import file from GitHub

### Call libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
url <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thayerm/tidyverse/main/hotels.csv'
hotels <- read_csv(url)
names(hotels)
```
### Summary of Variables 
```{r}
glimpse(hotels)
```
## Select Commands
```{r}
select(hotels, lead_time) #one var
```
```{r}
select(hotels, hotel, lead_time) #two var
```
